channel.title: Need help fast
channel.description: Hey guys I need help there is a dupe on my server. if you are on the second trade screen as someone and you type ::home and accept at the same time, you both keep the item. If anyone can please help me with this in TV that would be great, thanks

item.title: Need help fast
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“The Mike, post:5, topic:529145”]Im new to this, could you possible do it for me?[/quote]No. How would you learn for future reference if people did everything for you? Arcik gave you a very good outline of what it should look like. Try to do it yourself, and if you run into problems, post what errors you’re getting.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help fast
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“The Mike, post:3, topic:529145”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=647901.msg4357708#msg4357708 date=1378028954]
if (inTrade) {
sendMessage(“you cannot teleport in trade”!);
return;
}
[/quote]

I get 2 errors. Can you please teamviewer me?[/quote]You don’t just copy and paste. Wherever it handles teleporting, have it check if the player is in a trade screen, and if so, disallow the teleport (basically just translating Arcik’s code snippet).

Read full topic
